params.constructorArgs: The encoded constructor args to deploy the contract with.
params.contractBytecode: The bytecode of the contract to deploy.
params.publishMetadataUri: The publish metadata URI for the contract to deploy.
params.salt: The salt to use in the CREATE2 contract deployment.
params.value: The native token value to pass to the contract on deployment.

returns.deployedAddress: The address of the contract deployed.

params.implementation: The contract implementation for the clone to point to.
params.initializeData: The encoded function call to initialize the contract with.
params.publishMetadataUri: The publish metadata URI and for the contract to deploy.
params.salt: The salt to use in the CREATE2 contract deployment.
params.value: The native token value to pass to the contract on deployment.

returns.deployedAddress: The address of the contract deployed.

deployInstance(address,bytes,bytes,bytes.notice: Deploys an instance of a published contract directly.

deployInstanceProxy(address,address,byte.notice: Deploys a clone pointing to an implementation of a published contract.
